document_data.name: Chalarstaukh
document_data.mainbody: '''Chalarstaukh''' was the largest [[goblin]] realm in the [[Rauvin Mountains]] in [[Luruar]].
document_data.Geography: Chalarstaukh was located in the [[Chalarstaukh caverns]] in the western foothills of the Rauvin Mountains, not far from [[Citadel Felbarr]].
document_data.Government: In [[1372 DR]], King [[Asglarek]] and his seven sons ruled Chalarstaukh.
document_data.Inhabitants: Chalarstaukh was inhabited by goblins, who subsisted on yellow cave-worms. This habit meant that the Chalarstaukh goblins were called "Worm-Eaters" by the [[orc]]s above, who often raided the goblin warrens.
document_data.History: In the 1370s DR, the goblins of Chalarstaukh delved southwest of their home and discovered a number of [[dwarf]] tombs. The goblins ransacked the tombs, finding a number of magical items they intended to use against their enemies—if they ever figured out how to use them.
